name: Chase Loop
description:
A chill 'racing' game about driving in a loop.

2 Game Modes

- Score attack: see how many coins you can collect in 10 loops around the track.

- Endless: see how many coins you can collect, and how many loops you can do, in an endless run.

Tutorial

- WASD or ARROW KEYS to move (W/UP to accelerate, use the other keys to turn)

- You can press M to mute the music.

- You can press SPACE to change colour palettes.

- You can press Q to return to the menu at any time.

Other Notes

- If your inputs aren't working, try clicking the screen.

- Make sure to leave a comment and a rating!

Thanks for playing :D
